Name: Enigmatica6
Overview: Play with new mods and old favorites in Minecraft 1.16.5! Enigmatica 6 offers a boatload of custom content including quests![br][br]Setup:[br][li]You must accept the EULA by setting the [b]EULA[/b] variable to [span style='color: #00E800;']true[/span] or the install will fail.[br]Optional:[br][li]You can setup a comma separated list of players who will have admin privileges in game by setting [b]OPS[/b]

Port.Name: Port
Port.Description: Port for the server. Ignored if using a dedicated IP for the container.

EULA.Name: EULA
EULA.Description: By typing TRUE you are indicating your agreement to the EULA of Mojang. Read it at https://account.mojang.com/documents/minecraft_eula before accepting it.

MAX_RAM.Name: MAX_RAM
MAX_RAM.Description: Maximum memory for the server. Must end in G for gigabytes.

OPS.Name: OPS
OPS.Description: Comma separated list of players to have op capability

Installed Location.Name: Installed Location
Installed Location.Description: Path to store the installed server files.
